reviews.text:
I am very impressed the service provided by AYS . Mr Alex Tan has met us and to pre-arrange for my beloved mother who passed away 17 Nov.

The whole arrangement set up parlour were very unique. The environment is well maintained by his team members especially Ms Olivia who has been taking care the area to our friends and relatives. üëçü´∞

The funeral emcee lead by Ms Jaime and her team were very calm towards the whole procession until Mandai. üôèüôè

Alex on behalf of our family we really appreciate you and your great team the way you handled the situation smoothly without any issues. Highly recommended.
Thanks you all without you my family won't be able to cope up the situation.

Jia Jia and her team provided prompt responses and  timely service, and gave clear information throughout this period. Her team's support made a challenging time more manageable for our family.

We would like to extend our special thanks to ‰∫éÂ§ßÂì• for his calm guidance, experienced handling, and genuine empathy during the wake and funeral. His presence and care meant a lot to us.

With gratitude,
Gin, Mum, Tan and Lee family.

The execution of their services, from getting the undertakers involved and creating a photo for the deceased, to the wake arrangements and cremation, have been smooth and efficient. This company provides highly reliable and professional services which have been used by my bigger family for 2 generations. With their 2nd generation taking over the running of the business, the company's services have become even better and more suited to the ways of life, work, and communication styles of new customers.

This is the 3rd time my family engaged AYS across more than 10 years and we can see vast improvements in their services.  In the past, it was already very organized, and even more so now.  This is a company that continuously improves and make things better.

From pre-planning to the completion of my father's passing and ash scattering, Ms Ang and her team stayed with us throughout the whole process, providing prompt assistance to our questions, making it so much easier to focus on what we need to do for our father.

The entire team is very professional, and our guests were also very impressed with the very nice setup of the whole wake, we even have some guests requesting for their name cards!

Thank you very much Ms Ang and your team again.
Jia jia and her team gave us expert advice and superb service. Accommodating all our requests and making sure everything was taken care of. Thank you all for making this hard time easier.
